name: Just Saying - the hilarious game of mixed-up phrases!
name_original: Just Saying - the hilarious game of mixed-up phrases!
description:
*********************************
We've released a new game! "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power!" It's free to try so please help us celebrate by downloading "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power" today!!
*********************************

"You're pretty much guaranteed to laugh, get stumped, and have a great time!" -- AppPicker.com

From the husband and wife team that brought you "Chain of Thought" comes their newest word game sensation: "Just Saying - the hilarious game of mixed-up phrases!"

Can you and your friends unscramble all the famous sayings? There are tons of pop culture categories-- from Movie Titles to Song Lyrics to Words of Wisdom.


FEATURES:

•Hilarious "Mad-Lib-Mixed-Up" fun
•Super easy to learn
•Free hints if you need a little extra help
•Tons of pop culture categories
•Game Center Leaderboard to compare your score with friends

There are 50 free puzzles to test your brain and tickle your funny bone. Additional puzzle packs are available as in-app purchases.

This might be your new favorite word game -- Just Saying!!
